subject: Physical Fitness
title: Spot Reduction Is a Myth
description: A short lesson to help you apply Spot Reduction Is a Myth.

hook.text: Thousands of crunches won't burn belly fat. Your body doesn't take fat from wherever you exercise.

buildup.text: Fat loss is systemic. Your body draws from fat stores based on genetics, not on which muscle works.

discovery.text: Studies confirm: exercising one area doesn't reduce fat there. Tennis players' arms have equal fat on both sides.

twist.text: Ab exercises build ab muscles â€” but they stay hidden under fat until overall body fat drops.

climax.text: The only path to targeted appearance changes is reducing total body fat through diet and exercise.

punchline.text: You can't choose where fat leaves. Your genetics already decided.

quiz.question: Why doesn't spot reduction work?
options: The body draws fat from stores based on genetics, not local exercise
Muscles absorb nearby fat during exercise
Spot reduction only works with machines
